name: azure-devops
label: Azure DevOps
description: Azure DevOps is a cloud-based service for managing software development projects. The Azure DevOps FortiSOAR connector integrates with Azure DevOps to automate the management of repositories, pipelines, work items, and more within FortiSOAR, enabling streamlined DevOps workflows and incident response.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: IP address or hostname of the Azure DevOps server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: IP address or hostname of the Azure DevOps server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Organization Name
fields.name: organization
fields.tooltip: Specify the name of the organization on Azure DevOps.
fields.description: Specify the name of the organization on Azure DevOps.

fields.title: Auth Type
options: On behalf of User - Delegate Permission
fields.name: auth_type
fields.description: Select the method using which you will get authentication tokens used to access the security graph APIs. You can choose between On behalf of User - Delegate Permission or Without a User - Application Permission.
fields.tooltip: Select the method using which you will get authentication tokens used to access the security graph APIs.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Tenant ID
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: Specify the ID of the tenant assigned to you by the Azure application registration portal.
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.tooltip: Specify the ID of the tenant assigned to you by the Azure application registration portal.
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: tenant

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Client ID
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: Specify the Unique Application ID of the Azure Active Directory application to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on getting authentication tokens, see the Getting Authentication Tokens section.
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: client_id
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.tooltip: Specify the Unique Application ID of the Azure Active Directory application to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on getting authentication tokens, see the Getting Authentication Tokens section.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Client Secret
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: Specify the Unique Client Secret of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on how to get the secret key, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/microsoft-defender-atp/exposed-apis-create-app-webapp.
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: client_secret
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.tooltip: Specify the Unique Client Secret of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Authorization Code
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: code
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.tooltip: Specify the authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: Specify the authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Getting Access Tokens using the Delegate Permissions method section.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Redirect URL
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.tooltip: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: redirect_url
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. The redirect URL that you specify here must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you have registered in your app registration portal.

Access Token.title: Access Token
Access Token.name: api_key
Access Token.tooltip: Access Token that is provided to you by a Azure DevOps administrator that you will use to access the Azure DevOps REST API.
Access Token.description: Access Token that is provided to you by a Azure DevOps administrator that you will use to access the Azure DevOps REST API. For information on generating access tokens, refer https://docs.Azure DevOps.com/ee/user/profile/personal_access_tokens.html.

fields.title: API Version
fields.name: api_version
fields.tooltip: Specify the API version to use.
fields.description: Specify the API version to use. By default it uses 7.1 api-version.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get Pipeline List
operations.description: Retrieves list of all pipelines within a project.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipelines is to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipelines is to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Sort Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the based on which results is to be sorted.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the based on which results is to be sorted. By default it is set to name.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: order
parameters.tooltip: Select the sort order in which result is to be sorted.
parameters.description: Select the sort order in which result is to be sorted. You can choose from ASC or DESC.

parameters.title: Continuation Token
parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify the continuation token from a previous request, to retrieve the next page of results.
parameters.description: Specify the continuation token from a previous request, to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: $top
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records, to be retrieved in this operation.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records, to be retrieved in this operation.

operations.title: Get Pipeline Run List
operations.description: Retrieves top 10000 runs for a specified pipeline.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipeline runs are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipeline runs are to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Pipeline ID
parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pipeline whose runs are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pipeline whose runs are to be retrieved.

operations.title: Get Pipeline Run Details
operations.description: Retrieve details of a specific pipeline run.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipeline runs are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipeline runs are to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Pipeline ID
parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pipeline whose runs are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pipeline whose runs are to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Run ID
parameters.name: runId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pipeline whose runs are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pipeline whose runs are to be retrieved.

operations.title: Get Project List
operations.description: Retrieve a list of all projects within the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: stateFilter
parameters.tooltip: Select the state of the project to be retrieved from Azure DevOps.
parameters.description: Select the state of the project to be retrieved from Azure DevOps. By default it is set to "Well Formed". You can choose from "All","Create Pending", "Deleted", "Deleting", "New", "Unchanged", "Well Formed"

parameters.title: Continuation Token
parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify the continuation token from a previous request, to retrieve the next page of results.
parameters.description: Specify the continuation token from a previous request, to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: $skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records, to be skipped in this operation.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records, to be skipped retrieved in this operation.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: $top
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records, to be retrieved in this operation.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records, to be retrieved in this operation.

operations.title: Get Repository List
operations.description: Retrieve a list of all repositories within a project.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose repositories are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose repositories are to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Include Hidden Repositories
parameters.name: includeHidden
parameters.tooltip: Select to include hidden repositories in the response. The default value is false.
parameters.description: Select to include hidden repositories in the response. The default value is false.

parameters.title: Include All URLs
parameters.name: includeAllUrls
parameters.tooltip: Select to include all remote URLs in the response. The default value is false.
parameters.description: Select to include all remote URLs in the response. The default value is false.

parameters.title: Include Reference Links
parameters.name: includeLinks
parameters.tooltip: Select to include reference links in the response. The default value is false.
parameters.description: Select to include reference links in the response. The default value is false.

operations.title: Get Branch List
operations.description: Retrieves list of all branches within a specified repository.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project from which to retrieve the repository branches.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project from which to retrieve the repository branches.

parameters.title: Repository
parameters.name: repository
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID or name of the repository which is to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the ID or name of the repository which is to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Branch Name Filter (Contains)
parameters.name: filterContains
parameters.tooltip: Specify a substring to filter branch names that include this value.
parameters.description: Specify a substring to filter branch names that include this value.

parameters.title: Branch Name Filter (Starts With)
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify a prefix to filter branch names that begin with the given value. For example, heads/ma will return branches such as refs/heads/main and refs/heads/master. Use this filter to narrow down results based on the starting characters of branch names.
parameters.description: Specify a prefix to filter branch names that begin with the given value. For example, heads/ma will return branches such as refs/heads/main and refs/heads/master. Use this filter to narrow down results based on the starting characters of branch names.

parameters.title: Include My Branches
parameters.name: includeMyBranches
parameters.tooltip: Include only branches that the user owns, favorites, and the default branch. Default is false.
parameters.description: Include only branches that the user owns, favorites, and the default branch. Default is false.

parameters.title: Include Statuses
parameters.name: includeStatuses
parameters.tooltip: Include up to the first 1000 commit statuses for each ref. Default is false.
parameters.description: Include up to the first 1000 commit statuses for each ref. Default is false.

parameters.title: Include Links
parameters.name: includeLinks
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether referenceLinks should be included in the result. Default is false.
parameters.description: Specify whether referenceLinks should be included in the result. Default is false.

parameters.title: Latest Statuses Only
parameters.name: latestStatusesOnly
parameters.tooltip: Include only the tip commit status for each ref. Requires includeStatuses to be true. Default is false.
parameters.description: Include only the tip commit status for each ref. Requires includeStatuses to be true. Default is false.

parameters.title: Peel Tags
parameters.name: peelTags
parameters.tooltip: Specify if annotated tags should populate the PeeledObjectId property. Default is false.
parameters.description: Specify if annotated tags should populate the PeeledObjectId property. Default is false.

parameters.title: Continuation Token
parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify the continuation token used for pagination.
parameters.description: Specify the continuation token used for pagination.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: $top
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of refs to return. It cannot be bigger than 1000.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of refs to return. It cannot be bigger than 1000.

operations.description: Retrieve details of a specific commit.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project

parameters.description: Specify the name of the project from which to retrieve the repository branches.

parameters.title: Repository

parameters.description: Specify the ID or name of the repository whose commit is to be retrieved.

parameters.description: Specify the ID of the commit which is to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Change Count
parameters.name: changeCount
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of changes to include in the result.
parameters.description: Specify the number of changes to include in the result.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: searchCriteria.status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of the pull requests to be retrieved from Azure DevOps.
parameters.description: Select the status of the pull requests to be retrieved from Azure DevOps. By default it is set to "Not Set". You can choose from "All", "Active", "Abandoned", "Completed", "Not Set"

parameters.title: Search Criteria
parameters.name: searchCriteria
parameters.tooltip: Specify the search criteria to retrieve the pull requests from Azure DevOps.
parameters.description: Specify the search criteria to retrieve the pull requests from Azure DevOps. For example,

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: $skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records, to be skipped in this operation.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records, to be skipped retrieved in this operation.

parameters.title: Limit

operations.title: Get Pull Request Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific pull request.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipeline runs are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipeline runs are to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Pull Request ID
parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pull request which is to be retrieved for the specified project.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pull request which is to be retrieved for the specified project.

operations.title: Create Pull Request
operations.description: Creates a new pull request for code changes to be reviewed and merged.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.
parameters.description: Specify the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.

parameters.title: Repository
parameters.name: repositoryId
parameters.tooltip: Select the ID or name of the repository where the pull request will be created.
parameters.description: Select the ID or name of the repository where the pull request will be created.

parameters.title: Pull Request Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.tooltip: Specify a title for the pull request.
parameters.description: Specify a title for the pull request.

parameters.title: Source Branch Name
parameters.name: sourceRefName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the source branch.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the source branch.

parameters.title: Target Branch Name
parameters.name: targetRefName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the target branch.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the target branch.

parameters.title: Pull Request Description
parameters.name: pr_description
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description for the pull request.
parameters.description: Specify a description for the pull request.

parameters.title: Reviewers
parameters.name: reviewers
parameters.tooltip: Specify the reviewers for this pull request in CSV format.
parameters.description: Specify the reviewers for this pull request in CSV format.

parameters.title: Supports Iterations
parameters.name: supportsIterations
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether to enable reviewing of subsequent pushes individually.
parameters.description: Specify whether to enable reviewing of subsequent pushes individually.

parameters.title: Additional Inputs
parameters.name: additional_input
parameters.tooltip: Specify other parameters of pull request to be created in json format.
parameters.description: Specify other parameters of pull request to be created in json format. For example, { "isDraft": true }

operations.title: Update Pull Request
operations.description: Updates an existing pull request with new information such as status, title, description, and merge options.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.
parameters.description: Specify the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.

parameters.title: Repository
parameters.name: repositoryId
parameters.tooltip: Select the ID or name of the repository where the pull request exists.
parameters.description: Select the ID or name of the repository where the pull request exists.

parameters.title: Pull Request ID
parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pull request to update.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pull request to update.

parameters.title: Pull Request Title
parameters.name: pr_title
parameters.tooltip: Specify a new title for the pull request.
parameters.description: Specify a new title for the pull request.

parameters.title: Pull Request Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify a new description for the pull request (up to 4000 characters).
parameters.description: Specify a new description for the pull request (up to 4000 characters).

parameters.title: Pull Request Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the new status of the pull request.
parameters.description:
Specify the new status of the pull request. You can choose from "Active",
            "Abandoned",
            "Completed",
            "Not Set"

parameters.title: Target Branch Name
parameters.name: targetRefName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the new target branch if retargeting the pull request.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the new target branch if retargeting the pull request.

parameters.title: Additional Inputs
parameters.name: additional_input
parameters.tooltip: Specify other parameters of pull request to be updated in json format.
parameters.description: Specify other parameters of pull request to be updated in json format.

operations.title: Get Pull Request Reviewer List
operations.description: Retrieve the list of reviewers for a specific pull request.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.

parameters.title: Repository
parameters.name: repositoryId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID or name of the repository where the pull request exists.
parameters.description: Specify the ID or name of the repository where the pull request exists.

parameters.title: Pull Request ID
parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pull request whose reviewers you want to retrieve.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pull request whose reviewers you want to retrieve.

operations.title: Add Pull Request Reviewer
operations.description: Add a reviewer to a pull request or cast a vote on a pull request in Azure DevOps.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.

parameters.title: Repository
parameters.name: repositoryId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID or name of the repository where the pull request exists.
parameters.description: Specify the ID or name of the repository where the pull request exists.

parameters.title: Pull Request ID
parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pull request to which the reviewer will be added.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pull request to which the reviewer will be added.

parameters.title: Reviewer ID
parameters.name: reviewerId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the reviewer to be added to the pull request.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the reviewer to be added to the pull request.

operations.title: Get Pull Request Commit List
operations.description: Retrieve the commits associated with a specific pull request in Azure DevOps.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the Azure DevOps project associated with the repository.

parameters.title: Repository
parameters.name: repositoryId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID or name of the repository where the pull request exists.
parameters.description: Specify the ID or name of the repository where the pull request exists.

parameters.title: Pull Request ID
parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pull request for which the commits are to be listed.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pull request for which the commits are to be listed.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: $top
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of commits to return.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of commits to return.

parameters.title: Continuation Token
parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.tooltip: Specify the continuation token used for pagination.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the continuation token used for pagination.

operations.title: Get Commit List
operations.description: Retrieve the commits for a specific repository in Azure DevOps.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the Azure DevOps project.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the name of the Azure DevOps project.

parameters.title: Repository
parameters.name: repositoryId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID or name of the repository.
parameters.description: Specify the ID or name of the repository.

parameters.title: Commit IDs
parameters.name: searchCriteria.ids
parameters.tooltip: Specify exact commit IDs to retrieve in CSV format.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify exact commit IDs to retrieve in CSV format.

parameters.title: Committer
parameters.name: searchCriteria.user
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alias or display name of the committer.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the alias or display name of the committer.

parameters.title: From Commit ID
parameters.name: searchCriteria.fromCommitId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the lower bound commit ID for filtering commits.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the lower bound commit ID for filtering commits.

parameters.title: To Commit ID
parameters.name: searchCriteria.toCommitId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the upper bound commit ID for filtering commits.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the upper bound commit ID for filtering commits.

parameters.title: From Date
parameters.name: searchCriteria.fromDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start date to include history entries created after this date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the start date to include history entries created after this date.

parameters.title: To Date
parameters.name: searchCriteria.toDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end date to include history entries created before this date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the end date to include history entries created before this date.

parameters.title: Commit Author
parameters.name: searchCriteria.author
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alias or display name of the author.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the alias or display name of the author.

parameters.title: Exclude Deletes
parameters.name: searchCriteria.excludeDeletes
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether to exclude delete entries for the specified path.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify whether to exclude delete entries for the specified path.

parameters.title: History Mode
parameters.name: searchCriteria.historyMode
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Git history mode to use.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the Git history mode to use.

parameters.title: Include Push Data
parameters.name: searchCriteria.includePushData
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether to include push information.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify whether to include push information.

parameters.title: Show Oldest Commits First
parameters.name: searchCriteria.showOldestCommitsFirst
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether to show the oldest commits first.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify whether to show the oldest commits first.

parameters.title: Search Criteria
parameters.name: searchCriteria
parameters.tooltip: Specify the search criteria to retrieve the commits from Azure DevOps.
parameters.description: Specify the search criteria to retrieve the commits from Azure DevOps. For example, you can include parameters like `fromCommitId`, `toCommitId`, `author`, and `fromDate`.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: $skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of records to skip.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: $top
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of commits to retrieve.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of commits to retrieve.

operations.title: Run Pipeline
operations.description: Triggers a new run for a specified pipeline.

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.name: project
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipeline runs are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project on Azure DevOps, whose pipeline runs are to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Pipeline ID
parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the pipeline to run.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the pipeline to run.

parameters.title: Stages to Skip
parameters.name: stagesToSkip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the names of the pipeline stages in CSV format that should be skipped during execution.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the names of the pipeline stages in CSV format that should be skipped during execution.

parameters.title: Pipeline Version
parameters.name: pipelineVersion
parameters.tooltip: Specify the pipeline version.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the pipeline version.

parameters.title: Preview Run
parameters.name: previewRun
parameters.tooltip: If true, don't actually create a new run. Instead, return the final YAML document after parsing templates.
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, don't actually create a new run. Instead, return the final YAML document after parsing templates.

parameters.title: Resources
parameters.name: resources
parameters.tooltip: Specify the resources required for the run.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the resources required for the run.
